topBand.overlay: Your contribution has enabled us to build this clinic

midComponent.infoSection:
Our first mini medical center was successfully built in a rural village of Taung Yin, Kyauk Phyu.
Each mini medical healthcare system will provide 90% of health and medical needs so that patients can receive the care they need right in their own village.
The center also offers preventative health programs, that include health screening, immunization, and chronic disease management, contraception, active aging among others.
We also have mother and child health programs, illness and injury programs, dental care programs, and basic lab and radiologic services available.
Without your support, we couldnâ€™t have achieved this.  Please keep helping by clicking "Donate".

video.title: Check our video of a medical center being built in Taung Yin

rightBlock.care: Care for Peace is a non profit organization founded in 2012.  We are dedicated to build healthy communities in Myanmar
